title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE storage variants and color options revealed
description: It's almost time for the next-generation Galaxy S Fan Edition phone, so the rumors start flying in. The Galaxy S25 FE is expected to arrive sometime in September, if we go by the Galaxy S24 FE release last year, and we already know what it would look like as well as some key specs. Galaxy S24 FE The latest leak talks about the device's memory and color options. The device will offer the usual 8GB/128GB and 8GB/256GB storage configurations, which are a bit disappointing given that most competitors in the price bracket offer 256GB base storage. excerpt: It will borrow paint jobs from the current Galaxy S lineup. It's almost time for the next-generation Galaxy S Fan Edition phone, so the rumors start flying...
text: It's almost time for the next-generation Galaxy S Fan Edition phone, so the rumors start flying in. The Galaxy S25 FE is expected to arrive sometime in September, if we go by the Galaxy S24 FE release last year, and we already know what it would look like as well as some key specs. Galaxy S24 FEThe latest leak talks about the device's memory and color options. The device will offer the usual 8GB/128GB and 8GB/256GB storage configurations, which are a bit disappointing given that most competitors in the price bracket offer 256GB base storage. As far as colors go, which are not accompanied by renders, are Navy, Icy Blue, Jet Black and White. We've already seen the Navy, Jet Black and Icy Blue colors on the current Galaxy S lineup, so we have a good idea of what to expect. Also, none of the listed colors is an option on the current Galaxy S24 FE. Source
html:
It's almost time for the next-generation Galaxy S Fan Edition phone, so the rumors start flying in. The Galaxy S25 FE is expected to arrive sometime in September, if we go by the Galaxy S24 FE release last year, and we already know what it would look like as well as some key specs.

Galaxy S24 FE

The latest leak talks about the device's memory and color options. The device will offer the usual 8GB/128GB and 8GB/256GB storage configurations, which are a bit disappointing given that most competitors in the price bracket offer 256GB base storage.

As far as colors go, which are not accompanied by renders, are Navy, Icy Blue, Jet Black and White. We've already seen the Navy, Jet Black and Icy Blue colors on the current Galaxy S lineup, so we have a good idea of what to expect. Also, none of the listed colors is an option on the current Galaxy S24 FE.

Source
